title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA: Accelerate Massive Data Processing with NVIDIA on AWS EMR (AIM279)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA：使用 NVIDIA 在 AWS EMR 上加速海量数据处理 (AIM279)
abstract: This session explores how NVIDIA GPU acceleration with Apache Spark on AWS EMR and AWS EMR on EKS (Kubernetes) can enhance the scalability, performance, and cost-efficiency of BigData analytics for financial market regulation.  Using industry standard benchmarks and FINRA’s workloads as a case study, we demonstrate improvements for next-generation ETL pipelines. Attendees will learn how FINRA, a leader in market data- driven fraud detection, leverages cutting-edge hardware and software to meet rising data volumes and strict business SLAs without linear cost growth. The talk presents quantitative results from benchmarking Spark GPU clusters against traditional CPU deployments. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了在 AWS EMR 和 AWS EMR on EKS（Kubernetes）上使用 NVIDIA GPU 加速 Apache Spark 如何提升金融市场监管领域大数据分析的可扩展性、性能和成本效益。我们以行业标准基准测试和 FINRA 的工作负载为案例研究，展示了下一代 ETL 管道的改进成果。与会者将了解作为市场数据驱动欺诈检测领域领导者的 FINRA，如何利用尖端硬件和软件来应对不断增长的数据量和严格的业务 SLA 要求，同时避免成本线性增长。本次演讲展示了 Spark GPU 集群与传统 CPU 部署对比的量化基准测试结果。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 NVIDIA 提供支持。
